description:
Gao faces Wisdom in a Buddyfight, but things take an unexpected turn when Geargod ver. 099`s Overkill is unleashed. Gao and his friends must flee when Geargod runs wild.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geargod no Gyaku Tensatsu! Oitsumerareta Kiba-ou!!
Geargod`s Overkill! Gao in Dire Straits!
ギアゴッドの逆天殺! 追いつめられた牙王!!
